Key Match Events: Ben Lively's start abruptly ended on Tuesday after he was hit in the hip with a line drive.
Lane Thomas blasted a three-run homer in the top of the sixth inning, giving Cleveland a commanding four-run lead.
Kyle Manzardo recorded two hits in his four at-bats, including an RBI single that gave the Guardians their first run of the night.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cleveland Guardians defeated the Chicago White Sox behind another solid showing from the bullpen.
Cleveland clinched a series victory over the Chicago White Sox on Tuesday night, 5-0.
The Guardians' relievers got the team through the game, not allowing a single run along the way.
Others: Ben Lively only pitched 2.0 innings, which meant Cleveland's bullpen had to make up the next 7.0 innings.
Lane Thomas is now hitting.326/.380/.609 over his last 15 games.
Kyle Manzardo has continued to provide the Guardians with a solid spark in the lineup since being promoted just over a week ago.
